faq.title: Common Questions
faq.subtitle: Get answers to the most frequently asked questions from Egyptian enterprises considering IT transformation.

q1.question: How long does IT infrastructure migration take?
q1.answer: Most migrations complete in 2-4 weeks with zero business disruption. We work during off-hours and maintain full backups with rollback capability throughout the process.

q2.question: What if we're locked into a current provider contract?
q2.answer: We help you review contract terms and plan migrations that align with renewal dates. Many clients save enough to offset early termination costs if needed.

q3.question: Do you provide on-site support in Egypt?
q3.answer: Yes! Our Egyptian-based team provides on-site support across Cairo, Alexandria, and major cities, plus 24/7 remote assistance in Arabic and English.

q4.question: How do you ensure our data stays in Egypt?
q4.answer: All data is hosted in Egyptian data centers with contractual guarantees. You maintain full ownership and can audit storage locations anytime.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Got questions? We've got answers. If you can't find what you're looking for, contact our team.
faq.q1: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.a1: We accept bank transfers, credit cards, and can arrange custom payment terms for enterprise clients. All prices are in Egyptian Pounds (EGP).
faq.q2: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan?
faq.a2: Yes, you can change your plan at any time. Upgrades take effect immediately, and downgrades apply at the next billing cycle. We'll prorate any differences.
faq.a3: No, there are no hidden setup fees. The price you see is the price you pay. Implementation and onboarding support is included in all plans.
faq.a4: All plans include technical support via email and phone. Professional plans get 24/7 priority support, and Enterprise clients have a dedicated account manager.
faq.q5: Do you offer a free trial?
faq.a5: We offer a free consultation and demo to help you understand how our solutions fit your needs. Contact us to schedule a personalized demonstration.
